channel.title: Can some one help me make a good server plz

ok i got a couple of questions plz answen as muck as u can and make it easy to understand plz ty

plz help me ty

item.description:

  1. those tuts are easily found on moparscape
  2. YOU DONT KNOW WHAT YOUR DOING
  3. YOU DONT KNOW ANYTHING ABOUT JAVA

…If you still insist on making your own so you can say your “owner” go to trune;server.com, has some great tuts.
